Form Iberia: Unite with Spain, gives cores and accepted
Get cores on the stuff Andalus owns in Iberia, not very strong and you do not get andalusian accepted, just here for stuff to waste infamy on
If you have lost in Iberia but still own Naples you can turn into Two Sicilies with this decision. It does lock you out of Iberia tho.

After our defeat at the battle of Madrid our dream of restoring Allahs grace to Iberia have been all but forgotten. However, a man called Abdullah al-Masarie Althiyran has recently had a vision! He saw Spaniards and Andalusians alike, praying and basking in ALlahs holy light! This is clearly a sign that we must invade the Spaniards and turn them from their heretical ways! Mashallah!
End the Jihad and form your formable, gives you cores on all of Iberia and a silly name. If you do not have Maghrebi accepted yet this gives it to you for free.
Get Catalan as accepteds, this is the only Spanish accepted you can get.
